name: Online Gantt Chart
summary: A GANTT file is a Gantt chart created by Online Gantt. When opened in Online Gantt, GANTT files appear as bar chart-based project schedules. However, GANTT files are actually renamed .JSON files, which contain plain text data that Online Gantt uses to show a Gantt chart.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: GANTT file open in Online Gantt
images.alt: GANTT file open in Online Gantt
